title: "Advanced R workshop"

**Date**: Monday, October 24, 2022

This homepage contains all materials used during the **Advanced `R` workshop** taught at the University of Michigan [EEB department](https://lsa.umich.edu/eeb). The workshops is organized by Katrina Munsterman, Zulay Rodriguez and Max Hesselbarth. 

<ADD PEOPLE HELP TEACHING!>

The introductory slides for each topic can be found under the "Slides" menu item. For each topic there is an exercise and a corresponding solution, which can be found under the "Exercise" and "Solution" menu items.

In case you have any questions, please contact [mhessel\<at>umich.edu](mailto:mhessel@umich.edu), [kmunster@umich.edu\<at>umich.edu](mailto:kmunster@umich.edu@umich.edu), or [zulayrod\<at>umich.edu](mailto:zulayrod@umich.edu).

### Content

- Using the _tidyverse_
- Data visualization using _ggplot2_
- Spatial data

### Packages used for exercise

- palmerpenguins, tidyverse, (broom), magrittr, cowplot, sf, terra, tmap
